评论详情: It's loose and comfortable, and the split sides add a nice touch while allowing for better airflow. The fabric is great at wicking away sweat, so I stay dry and comfortable during my exercises. Plus, it looks cute enough to wear even outside of the gym. I'm really happy with this purchase and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great workout tank!
It's a great shirt for the price. Comfortable and very soft.
I bought two of these in different colors. Very cute workout tank with a perfect length and racerback. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because they wrinkle really easy!!!!
Liked the fit and color. Great addition to my workout wardrobe.

This top is thin, cheap and came with a stain and was so wrinkled in the packaging not folded at all and I'm pretty sure used. I washed it to get the stain out but it’s still there. I wouldn’t mind if it wasn’t front and center.

I love these little tops. I'm 61 so I don't want too much of a crop but these hit at the top of my shorts. So in the perfect spot. They are super soft and very airy and cool in the Florida heat. They are super lightweight but don't feel cheap or flimsy. I wear these daily for 6 months of the year and just can't say enough good about them.
Cute top, very soft and comfy. Wrinkles bad, not a fan of having to iron a work out shirt

This is a very nice shirt for the gym, playing pickleball,  going out for a hot summer dinner. I loved this so much I purchased 3. One in every color. I do wear a sports bra underneath and so, the M fit perfect. At 5'  petite medium size the large was just too large in the arm holes

I am 5'3" and have fairly wide shoulders. I wear a 34 A-B depending on the bra. So many tops are too long for me but this is perfect. It is a good weight and flairs out a bit at the bottom, enough to not highlight areas I prefer not to be higlighted. After buying the first one, I bought a few more colors.

评论概述: White is very different from other colors
评论详情: I originally purchased this in grey and just loved the cut and fabric so I went back and ordered in black and white too. The black is now my favorite but the white is going back. The fabric is thinner than the colors and does not lay as nicely. If I had only ordered white I never would have ordered the other colors. Again, I love the other colors and would not hesitate to buy them again, but the white is a like a completely different item. My advice is to buy this brand in another color.
Very comfy and breathable material. You can move around really well while lifting weights and doing cardio…wish it was a tad longer…3 inches. But I’d buy it again!!

I love the softness of the material but it absorbs sweat which changes the color of the material (around the neck and arm pits) which looks gross, then when it dries, it leaves a stain at the edges of the sweat line!  I guess it'll be a good summer top for non-sports activities if you don't sweat. Unfortunately I've used it or i would return it.

Fits perfectly, good material, flattering.  I am 4ft 10in and it's hard to find a top that sits right on my hips or waist.  Usually everything is much too long.  I got 3 of these in different colors and need many more.  I've worn them all summer long and will wear them again next year and I'll also get more colors.
Una tela suave y el largo perfecto. Muy fresca
It's so soft and well made. The length is perfect (not too long like most tops) For reference 40B bust and L fit just right.
Tiene muy buena caída, es delgado y fresco, pero no trasluce nada. Me encanta que no sea muy largo.

This top fits true to size. I am 5'4", 132 Lbs, 68 yrs old. I have scoliosis of the spine so my tops are always a challenge to lay properly on my back. This top does it - it is not clingy, tight and the fabric is breathable. It is the perfect length for my height. I am between a petite and a regular and find that this top does not dwarf me and is the right length - it provides a nice modern but not too revealing look. Launders nicely. Great top, good price!
Great fit!
Light and breezy with good coverage!
Ordered 5. Comfy and very flattering.
This shirt does not show sweat and is very flattering. The material hangs nicely and does not show sweat or stain
It is a very nice sports top.  I'm hoping there will be more small sports tops available with larger back openings or lower armholes so colorful sports bras will show
I do read reviews prior to buying and then go from there. Leaving a review is important. Anyhow, I love this workout top. Very soft and fits just right. True to size
Great active workout wear top that’s very soft and looks good on. I’ll probably buy a few more colors.
I sooo wanted this to work for summer, but it’s see through.

I can't believe how hard it is to find a flattering workout top.  So many are either ridiculously long or so clingy they accentuate all the bulges you'd prefer to hide.  I must've tried over 2 dozen tanks and sleeveless shirts and returned them all.But finally I found this one and it fits the bill.  Being made of rayon, the material feels very cool to the touch.  It's a slightly heavier weight and drapes appealingly.  It is shapely while hiding all the things you want hidden.  The neckline and arm openings sit high so there's no accidental reveal when you bend over and move around.  Price is right too.Only minor downside is that it doesn't wick and isn't as lightweight as I prefer for my workout clothes.  But as I mentioned, the heavier weight allows it to drape more flatteringly.  And I knew it didn't wick when I bought it.
Perfect and confortable
